title: Logout Functionality
description: Ensure that the user is logged out properly and redirected to the main screen, and the header updates to non-authenticated state.

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials.
Click the logout button or perform logout action.
Verify the user is redirected to the main screen.
Verify that the header changes to non-authenticated state (e.g., no profile image).

title: Access Protected Routes as Unauthorized User
description: Confirm that unauthorized users are redirected to the login page when attempting to access protected routes.

steps.description: Ensure the user is logged out.
Navigate directly to a protected route such as community dashboard or post creation page.
Verify the user is redirected to the login page.

title: Create Community Post with Valid Data
description: Verify that an authenticated user can create a new community post with all required fields and receive a confirmation toast, then is redirected to updated post list.

steps.description: Log in as an authenticated user.
Navigate to the post creation form.
Fill in the title, content, and select a category.
Submit the post creation form.
Confirm a toast message appears confirming successful post creation.
Verify redirect to the updated post list displaying the new post.

title: Create Community Post with Missing Required Fields
description: Ensure form submission is prevented when required fields are missing, and appropriate warning messages are shown.

steps.description: Log in as an authenticated user.
Navigate to the post creation form.
Leave the title field empty, fill content and select category.
Attempt to submit the form.
Verify a warning message appears indicating title is required.
Repeat with empty content and empty category fields to verify respective warnings.

title: Read Community Post Detail
description: Verify that users can access a post detail page by URL and view correct content with formatted date display.

steps.description: Navigate to an existing post detail page using its URL.
Verify that the post title, content, and category are displayed correctly.
Verify the post creation date is displayed using proper format or relative time.

title: Edit Community Post by Author
description: Confirm that only post authors see edit and delete buttons and can successfully edit a post with updated data reflected immediately.

steps.description: Log in as the author of an existing post.
Navigate to the post detail page.
Verify that edit and delete buttons are visible.
Click edit button and navigate to edit form.
Confirm the form is pre-filled with the existing post data.
Update title and content fields, then submit the edit form.
Verify that the updated post data is immediately reflected on the post detail page.

title: Edit Community Post Not Visible to Non-Authors
description: Verify that users who are not the authors of a post do not see edit or delete buttons on the post detail page.

steps.description: Log in as a user who is not the author of a specific post.
Navigate to the post detail page.
Verify that edit and delete buttons are not visible.

title: Delete Post Confirmation and Redirect
description: Check that deleting a post prompts a confirmation, deletes the post upon confirmation, and redirects the user back to the post list.

steps.description: Log in as the post author.
Navigate to the post detail page.
Click the delete button.
Verify a confirmation prompt appears.
Confirm the deletion.
Verify the post is removed and the user is redirected to the updated post list page.

title: Category Filtering Shows Correct Posts
description: Verify that selecting a category filter displays only posts belonging to that category, and empty state appears if no posts exist.

steps.description: Log in as any authenticated user.
Navigate to the community dashboard.
Select a category filter from the list.
Verify that only posts associated with the selected category are displayed.
Select a category with no posts.
Verify an empty state message indicating no posts is shown.

title: Loading Skeletons Display During Data Fetch
description: Confirm that loading skeleton components are displayed on the UI during asynchronous data fetch operations to improve perceived performance.

steps.description: Initiate loading of the community dashboard posts or post detail page.
Verify that loading skeletons are visible prior to data being rendered.
Verify skeletons disappear once data is loaded.

title: 404 and Error Pages for Invalid Routes and Post IDs
description: Ensure that navigating to invalid post IDs or incorrect routes renders friendly 404 or error pages.

steps.description: Navigate to an invalid or non-existent post ID via URL.
Verify a friendly 404 or error page is displayed.
Navigate to an invalid route under the community section.
Verify a friendly 404 or error page is displayed.

title: Responsive Design Integrity on Mobile Viewports
description: Verify that the community platform UI adapts seamlessly to mobile viewport sizes with no broken elements or usability issues.

steps.description: Use a mobile viewport or emulator to access various pages including dashboard, post detail, create and edit forms.
Verify all UI elements display correctly with no overlap, cut-offs, or broken layouts.
Verify responsive navigation and interactive elements function as expected on mobile.
